issues.description: Enforcer injects code templates into files
issues.problem: Templates may conflict with existing code structure
issues.fix_needed: Only add minimal comments, not full code blocks

issues.description: Enforcer may not preserve proper indentation
issues.fix_needed: Use AST-aware insertion that respects indentation

issues.description: Enforcer doesn't validate syntax after modifications
issues.problem: Saves broken files without detecting errors
issues.fix_needed: Add compile() or ast.parse() validation before saving
Keep original content and restore on validation failure

issues.description: Enforcer adds 'from typing import' without checking existing imports
issues.problem: Creates 'from X from typing' syntax errors
issues.fix_needed: Parse existing imports first, don't blindly insert

issues.description: Enforcer may not preserve proper indentation
issues.fix_needed: Use AST-aware insertion that respects indentation

patterns.cause: Enforcer inserted 'from typing import' after existing 'from X' import
patterns.example: from datetime from typing import Dict, List
patterns.root_cause: Blind string insertion without parsing imports

patterns.pattern: try: at wrong indentation after if statement
patterns.cause: Enforcer added try-except block without checking parent indentation

patterns.pattern: Code templates injected into existing code
patterns.correct: Add only minimal comments or type hints

issues.description: Auto-fixer doesn't detect 'from X from typing' pattern
issues.fix_needed: Add regex pattern to detect and fix corrupted imports
